node.doctext: This nodelet used to list news from the world of Everything development — "Everything" being the name of the software upon which PerlMonks is built. Alas, the Everything Development website is gone, and there is no more news. If you want to see what that web site looked like when it was alive, you can visit the [http://web.archive.org/web/20071229031958/http://everydevel.com/|Wayback Machine].
node.title: About the Everything Developer Nodelet
